recipes.label: Ending an Edge-Dyad?
recipes.startdescription: It is said that an Edge-Long cannot die save by the hand of their nemesis, but I have heard a different rumour: that an Edge-Long can be destroyed if slain alongside their dyad counterpart. To fight and kill two Edge-Long at once is almost certainly pure fantasy, but if I desire my revenge - if I desire to see the Wolf's promise fulfilled - I will need to end the Exile and their Foe, both.

recipes.label: Ending an Edge-Dyad?
recipes.startdescription: It is said that an Edge-Long cannot die save by the hand of their nemesis, but I have heard a different rumour: that an Edge-Long can be destroyed if slain alongside their dyadic counterpart. To fight and kill two Edge-Long at once is almost certainly pure fantasy, but if I desire my revenge - if I desire to see the Wolf's promise fulfilled - I will need to end the Exile and their Foe, both.

recipes.label: A Perfect Strike?
recipes.startdescription:
All my rage and pain and thirst for retribution - all of it must go into this next crucial, singular movement.

[You will need to provide a great source of Edge for this gambit to even have a chance to succeed. It might fail anyway.]

recipes.label: A Perfect Strike?
recipes.startdescription:
All my rage and pain and thirst for retribution - all of it must go into this next crucial, singular movement.

[You will need to provide a great source of Edge for this gambit to even have a chance to succeed. It might fail anyway.]

recipes.label: A Perfect Strike?
recipes.startdescription: A burning wave of exhilaration washes over me as I break through the Exile's guard. I want to tear their flesh, taste their blood, repay them for each meticulous night of torment -
recipes.description: All that to land only a single blow - but I've struck deep enough to make even an immortal worry.

recipes.label: My Attack has Fallen Short!
recipes.startdescription: My blow pings off the Edge-Long's body like a bullet off the hull of a warship. The Exile sneers. 'Unlucky.'

recipes.label: A Perfect Strike?
recipes.startdescription:
All my rage and pain and thirst for retribution - all of it must go into this next crucial, singular movement.

[You will need to provide a great source of Edge for this gambit to even have a chance to succeed. It might fail anyway.]

recipes.label: A Perfect Strike?
recipes.startdescription:
All my rage and pain and thirst for retribution - all of it must go into this next crucial, singular movement.

[You will need to provide a great source of Edge for this gambit to even have a chance to succeed. It might fail anyway.]

recipes.label: A Perfect Strike?
recipes.startdescription: It is almost divine, the way I find the blind spot in Duffoure's invincible defence. Angles converge, forces align, and my hand goes hurtling forth -
recipes.description: All that to land only a single blow - but I've struck deep enough to make even an immortal worry.

recipes.label: My Attack has Fallen Short!
recipes.startdescription: My blow pings off the Edge-Long's body like a bullet off the hull of a warship. The Foe chuckles. 'Sloppy.'

recipes.label: Unafraid
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.exile|'That look in your eye... taking your vengeance at last, then? Well, the Wolf's been waiting long enough for you to finally find the courage. Come here and make us both proud.'#foe.duffoure|'I see. You have become exactly what they had hoped for. No more pursuit, then - I will put you down now.'@ [Once you initiate this battle, there will be no turning back.]

recipes.label: Immortal Confrontation
recipes.startdescription: The Exile moves like a beast, every limb, digit, and hair bristling with killing intent. Their growling breaths steam the wintery air. It will only be another moment before they pounce again -

recipes.label: The Exile Strikes!
recipes.startdescription: @#exile.attack.a|The Exile surges forth, two blades bared like wicked fangs to rake through my flesh -#exile.attack.b|Slipping past my guard, the Exile sinks their teeth deep into my neck. Instantly, there is agony: white-hot, and intense enough to make the vision go black. I struggle to throw them off -#exile.attack.c|The Exile slices their palm and clenches hard, pulling their hand into a bleeding fist. When they thrust their hand forth, a spike of steaming gore condenses out of thin air, and hurtles towards me -@

recipes.label: An Impetuous Laugh
recipes.startdescription: 'If you need a moment to catch your breath, just say so.'

recipes.label: Pain and Terror
recipes.startdescription: Is this what it all comes to? Will this be the blow that ends me?

recipes.label: Force Equals Force
recipes.startdescription: The steel whistles past me as I sidestep. The Exile closes in again, blades whirling, but each time they swing or stab or thrust, I bat their blades back and away.

recipes.label: Annihilation Evaded
recipes.startdescription: I dive out of the way, and the onrushing spike of blood and force pierces only the ground where I had been standing a moment before. The air reeks of ozone and blood.

recipes.label: Staving Off Agony
recipes.startdescription: I stab the Exile in their guts once, twice - thrice and twisting, and then I feel their grip slacken just enough. A kick sends the Edge-Long stumbling back. The Exile smiles, and wipes their mouth.

recipes.label: Exhausted!
recipes.startdescription: I've employed these against my opponent, and I will need time before I can effectively employ them again -

recipes.label: Enemies-in-Arms
recipes.startdescription: 'Maybe my traitor-child wanted me to come. No doubt this is part of their plan to mold you for the Wolf - but I am a creature of rules. They are my blood; my Enemy. Mine. And you are overstepping.'

recipes.label: Enemies-in-Arms
recipes.startdescription: 'Maybe my traitor-child wanted me to come. No doubt this is part of their plan to mold you for the Wolf - but I am a creature of rules. They are my blood; my Enemy. Mine. And you are overstepping.'

recipes.label: Immortal Confrontation
recipes.startdescription: The ground seems to tremble with each of Duffoure's footsteps. Frost gathers on the earth where he walks. I search his one remaining eye for any betrayal of intention - it will only be seconds before he strikes again.

recipes.label: The Foe Strikes!
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.attack.a|Duffoure advances inexorably, each of his steps punctuated with the strike of his fist or a gunshot in my direction -#foe.attack.b|Duffoure whispers a sharp word to a taenite round in his hand, like an officer giving a soldier orders. He loads his gun and fires, and the bullet flies past me - but I hear it bend and snake in the wind - and then it turns to find me again! If I can't evade his shot -#foe.attack.c|Duffoure's myriad scars are suddenly aflare with a golden brilliance. He seems to lift off the ground as he charges towards me, the fingers of his hand pointed like a spear and wreathed in sharpest light -@

recipes.label: A Guttural Chuckle
recipes.startdescription: 'Too slow.'

recipes.label: Pain and Terror
recipes.startdescription: Is this what it all comes to? Will this be the blow that ends me?

recipes.label: Force Equals Force
recipes.startdescription: For each of Duffoure's steps, a counter-step; for each strike, a strike to intercept it. The force of every impact makes me grit my teeth and near-shatters my bones, but that is only pain. I am familiar with pain.

recipes.label: Light and Division
recipes.startdescription: The Colonel knows Light, but the Wolf-Divided was hewn of the Sun's agony, and his shadow will snuff out even the sharpest light if I invoke it with the proper ferocity. Though the ground beneath me is seared with Glory, I am able to blunt the worst of the Foe's piercing light.

recipes.label: Who Unmakes
recipes.startdescription: The bullet has orders to find me so long as it exists - and so I strike it from existence. The taenite bullet vanishes, leaving not even dust, and the space where it was now stinks faintly of blood and ozone.

recipes.label: Exhausted!
recipes.startdescription: I've employed these against my opponent, and I will need time before I can effectively employ them again -

recipes.label: Enemies-in-Arms
recipes.startdescription: 'After my Foe's blood, are you? Smart move - you knew that would draw me out, and now you can take your shot at me. What isn't so smart is that now - now, you're going to die.'

recipes.label: Enemies-in-Arms
recipes.startdescription: 'After my Foe's blood, are you? Smart move - you knew that would draw me out, and now you can take your shot at me. What isn't so smart is that now - now, you're going to die.'

recipes.label: A Gap in the Dragon's Scales?
recipes.startdescription: The Exile remains relentless in their aggression, but I can see their frustration mount with every attack I divert or avoid. That will make them careless.

recipes.label: A Gap in the Dragon's Scales?
recipes.startdescription: Duffoure is seasoned with decades of experience beyond mortal counting - but age makes him rigid, too. I am beginning to see a faint pattern in his movements.

recipes.label: VENGEANCE
recipes.startdescription: The Exile and their Foe teeter at the edge of oblivion. Duffoure snarls defiance, and the Exile's eyes blaze still with that familiar cruelty - but there is something else there, now. Not acceptance. Glee? Awe? A deep, dread howling rises on the wind. The shadows lengthen hungrily. My vision blurs red -

recipes.label: VENGEANCE
recipes.startdescription: The Exile and their Foe teeter at the edge of oblivion. Duffoure snarls defiance, and the Exile's eyes blaze still with that familiar cruelty - but there is something else there, now. Not acceptance. Wonder? Glee? A deep, dread howling rises on the wind. The shadows lengthen hungrily. My vision blurs red -
recipes.description: My hands pulp their immortal flesh; my teeth rip their immortal throats. The steaming gore of the dead Edge-Long covers me like a second skin. The Exile - teacher, torturer, kindred in hate - is no more. My revenge against them is complete. My revenge against all else is nigh. Air gathers in my lungs. I scream.

recipes.label: Immortal Assistance
recipes.startdescription: @#friend.sergei|The Iron-Eater charges on horseback towards the Exile, sabre whistling sharply in the wind as the cossack rides forth screaming death. It is all the Exile can do to dive out of the way, evading the Iron-Eater's rifle-fire as he wheels his horse back around -#friend.cross|Gyrvaengr descends soundlessly from above, spearlike stinger only narrowly missing the Edge-Long. It is only another moment before the Cross-warrior is upon the Exile with her claws and venoms, and they are hard-pressed to keep her at bay-@

recipes.label: Immortal Assistance
recipes.startdescription: @#friend.sergei|The Iron-Eater charges on horseback towards Duffoure, sabre whistling sharply in the wind as the cossack rides forth screaming death. It is all Duffoure can do to dive out of the way, evading the rifle-fire the Iron-Eater hounds him with as he wheels his horse back around -#friend.cross|Gyrvaengr descends soundlessly from above, spearlike stinger only narrowly missing the Edge-Long. It is only another moment before the Cross-soldier is upon Duffoure with her claws and venoms, and he is hard-pressed to keep her at bay-@
